name: Show_Cabinet_Display_size_Value
action:
<*ALLOWVALUES(Cabinet_Display_size:21.33 inch Touch,Cabinet_Display_size:24 inch Touch HP,Cabinet_Display_size:24 inch Touch Dell)*>
<*DISALLOWVALUES(Cabinet_Display_size:21.33 inch NTS,Cabinet_Display_size:23 inch NTS,Cabinet_Display_size:24 inch NTS NEC,Cabinet_Display_size:24 inch NTS DELL,Cabinet_Display_size:27 inch NTS NEC,Cabinet_Display_size:27 inch NTS DELL,Cabinet_Display_size:55 inch NTS)*>
